Package a12345678.change.to.your.matriculation.number

Class Wizard

Object
Wizard
All Implemented Interfaces:
MagicEffectRealization, MagicSource, Trader
public class Wizard extends Object implements MagicSource, Trader, MagicEffectRealization
Wizard class objects are the primary actors in the game. They can use and trade items, provide magic energy, cast spells and also are affected be various magical effects.

    boolean
    loot (Trader looter)
    Of looter is null, IllegalArgumentException has to be thrown; if looter cannot loot (canLoot returns false), no action can be taken and false is returned; if the this object can be looted (isLootable), transfer all the items in the object's inventory into the looter's inventory; items that don't fit in the looter's inventory because auf the weight limitation just vanish.

    sellItem (Tradeable item, Trader target)
    If item or target is null, IllegalArgumentException has to be thrown; if wizard is dead (isDead), no action can be taken and false is returned; call purchase on the item with this as seller and target as buyer; return true, if purchase was called successfully (returned true), false otherwise.
    boolean
    sellRandomItem (Trader target)
    If this object's inventory is empty, return false, otherwise choose a random item from inventory and delegate to sellItem(Tradeable, MagicEffectRealization).
    void
    setProtection (Set<AttackingSpell> attacks)
    Add all spells from attacks to instance variable protectedFrom
    boolean
    steal (Trader thief)
    If thief is null, IllegalArgumentException has to be thrown; if thief cannot steal (canSteal returns false) no action can be taken and false is returned; returns false if, the object's inventory is empty; otherwise transfers a random item from the this object's inventory into the thief's inventory; if the thief's inventory has not enough capacity, the object just vanishes and false is returned; returns true, if theft was successful.
    void
    takeDamage (int amount)
    Reduce the object's HP by amount ensuring however that HP does not become negative.
    void
    takeDamagePercent (int percentage)
    Reduce the object's HP by the percentage given of the object's basic HP value ensuring however, that HP does not become negative.
    String
    toString()
    Returns a string in the format "['name'('level'): 'HP'/'basicHP' 'MP'/'basicMP'; 'money' 'KnutOrKnuts'; knows 'knownSpells'; carries 'inventory']"; where 'level' is the asterisks representation of the level (see MagicLevel.toString) and 'knownSpells' and 'inventory' use the default toString method of Java Set; 'KnutOrKnuts' is Knut if 'money' is 1, Knuts otherwise.
    boolean
    useItem (Tradeable item, MagicEffectRealization target)
    If item or target is null, IllegalArgumentException has to be thrown; if wizard is dead (isDead) no action can be taken and false is returned; if wizard does not possess the item, false is returned; call useOn on the item with parameter target as target; return true, if useOn was called.
    boolean
    useRandomItem (MagicEffectRealization target)
    If this object's inventory is empty, return false; otherwise choose a random item from inventory and delegate to useItem(Tradeable, MagicEffectRealization).

    weakenMagic (int amount)
    Reduce the object's MP by amount ensuring however that MP does not become negative.
    void
    weakenMagicPercent (int percentage)
    Reduce the object's MP by the percentage given of the object's basic MP value ensuring however, that MP does not become negative.

  • Constructor Details

    • Wizard

      public Wizard (String name, MagicLevel level, int basicHP, int HP, int basicMP, int MP, int money, Set<Spell> knownSpells, Set<AttackingSpell> protectedFrom, int carryingCapacity, Set<Tradeable> inventory)
      Parameters:
      name - name
      level - the magic level (proficiency needed to cast spells)
      basicHP - base for percentage health calculations
      HP - current health
      basicMP - base for percentage mana calculations
      MP - current mana
      money - current money
      knownSpells - set of known spells
      protectedFrom - set of spells the object is protected against
      carryingCapacity - maximum carrying capacity
      inventory - set of items the object is currently carrying

  • Method Details

    • isDead

      public boolean isDead()
      Return true, if HP is 0, false otherwise
      Returns:
      true, if HP is 0, false otherwise

    • inventoryTotalWeight

      private int inventoryTotalWeight()
      Calculates and returns the total weight of all the items in the inventory
      Returns:
      total weight of all items in inventory

    • learn

      public boolean learn (Spell s)
      If spell is null, IllegalArgumentException has to be thrown; if wizard is dead (isDead) no action can be taken and false is returned; add spell to the set of knownSpells; returns true, if insertion was successful, false otherwise.
      Parameters:
      s - spell to be learned
      Returns:
      true, if insertion was successful, false otherwise.

    • forget

      public boolean forget (Spell s)
      If spell is null, IllegalArgumentException has to be thrown; if wizard is dead (isDead) no action can be taken and false is returned; remove spell from the set of knownSpells; returns true if removal was successful, false otherwise.
      Parameters:
      s - spell that the object is about to learn
      Returns:
      true, if removal was successful, false otherwise.

    • castSpell

      public boolean castSpell (Spell s, MagicEffectRealization target)
      If s or target is null, IllegalArgumentException has to be thrown; if wizard is dead (isDead) no action can be taken and false is returned; if wizard does not know the spell, false is returned; call cast on s with this as source and parameter target as target return true, if cast was called;
      Parameters:
      s - spell to be cast
      target - target of the spell to cast
      Returns:
      true, if cast was called, false otherwise;

    • castRandomSpell

      public boolean castRandomSpell (MagicEffectRealization target)
      If this object's knownSpells is empty, return false otherwise choose a random spell from knownSpells and delegate to castSpell(Spell, MagicEffectRealization)
      Parameters:
      target - target of the spell to cast
      Returns:
      false, if the object does not know a spell, otherwise the result of the delegation to castSpell

    • useItem

      public boolean useItem (Tradeable item, MagicEffectRealization target)
      If item or target is null, IllegalArgumentException has to be thrown; if wizard is dead (isDead) no action can be taken and false is returned; if wizard does not possess the item, false is returned; call useOn on the item with parameter target as target; return true, if useOn was called.
      Parameters:
      item - item to be used
      target - target on which item is to be used on
      Returns:
      true, if useOn was called, false otherwise

    • useRandomItem

      public boolean useRandomItem (MagicEffectRealization target)
      If this object's inventory is empty, return false; otherwise choose a random item from inventory and delegate to useItem(Tradeable, MagicEffectRealization).
      Parameters:
      target - target on which item is to be used on
      Returns:
      false, if the object does not possess any item, otherwise the result of the delegation to useItem

    • sellItem

      public boolean sellItem (Tradeable item, Trader target)
      If item or target is null, IllegalArgumentException has to be thrown; if wizard is dead (isDead), no action can be taken and false is returned; call purchase on the item with this as seller and target as buyer; return true, if purchase was called successfully (returned true), false otherwise.
      Parameters:
      item - item to be sold
      target - object the item is sold to (buyer)
      Returns:
      true, if purchase was called successfully (returned true), false otherwise.

    • sellRandomItem

      public boolean sellRandomItem (Trader target)
      If this object's inventory is empty, return false, otherwise choose a random item from inventory and delegate to sellItem(Tradeable, MagicEffectRealization).
      Parameters:
      target - object the item is sold to (buyer)
      Returns:
      false, if the object does not possess any item, otherwise the result of the delegation to sellItem

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string in the format "['name'('level'): 'HP'/'basicHP' 'MP'/'basicMP'; 'money' 'KnutOrKnuts'; knows 'knownSpells'; carries 'inventory']"; where 'level' is the asterisks representation of the level (see MagicLevel.toString) and 'knownSpells' and 'inventory' use the default toString method of Java Set; 'KnutOrKnuts' is Knut if 'money' is 1, Knuts otherwise. E.g. [Ignatius(**): 70/100 100/150; 72 Knuts; knows [[Episkey(*): 5 mana; +20 HP], [Confringo(*): 10 mana; -20 HP]]; carries []]
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      "['name'('level'): 'HP'/'basicHP' 'MP'/'basicMP'; 'money' 'KnutOrKnuts'; knows 'knownSpells'; carries 'inventory']"

    • provideMana

      public boolean provideMana (MagicLevel levelNeeded, int manaAmount)
      If wizard is dead (isDead) no action can be taken and false is returned: check if level is at least levelNeeded, return false otherwise; if MP is less than manaAmount return false; subtract manaAmount from MP and return true.
      Specified by:
      provideMana in interface MagicSource
      Parameters:
      levelNeeded - minimum magic level needed for the action
      manaAmount - amount of mana needed for the action
      Returns:
      true, if mana can be successfully provided, false otherwise

    • possesses

      public boolean possesses (Tradeable item)
      Return true, if the item is in the inventory, false otherwise
      Specified by:
      possesses in interface Trader
      Parameters:
      item - object is tested, if it possesses this item
      Returns:
      true, if the item is in the inventory, false otherwise

      public boolean canAfford (int amount)
      Return true, if money is greater than or equal to amount, false otherwise
      Specified by:
      canAfford in interface Trader
      Parameters:
      amount - object is tested, if it owns enough money to pay this amount
      Returns:
      true, if money is greater than or equal to amount, false otherwise

    • hasCapacity

      public boolean hasCapacity (int weight)
      Return true, if inventoryTotalWeight+weight is less than or equal to carryingCapacity, false otherwise
      Specified by:
      hasCapacity in interface Trader
      Parameters:
      weight - test, if this weight can be added to object's inventory, without exceeding the carryingCapacity
      Returns:
      true, if inventoryTotalWeight+weight is less than or equal to carryingCapacity, false otherwise

    • pay

      public boolean pay (int amount)
      If wizard is dead (isDead) no action can be taken and false is returned; if this owns enough money deduct amount from money and return true, return false otherwise
      Specified by:
      pay in interface Trader
      Parameters:
      amount - to be payed
      Returns:
      true, if payment succeeds, false otherwise

    • earn

      public boolean earn (int amount)
      If wizard is dead (isDead), no action can be taken and false is returned; add amount to this object's money and return true.
      Specified by:
      earn in interface Trader
      Parameters:
      amount - amount to be received
      Returns:
      true, if reception succeeds, false otherwise

    • addToInventory

      public boolean addToInventory (Tradeable item)
      Edd item to inventory if carryingCapacity is sufficient. returns true, if item is successfully added, false otherwise (carrying capacity exceeded or item is already in the inventory)
      Specified by:
      addToInventory in interface Trader
      Parameters:
      item - item to be added to object's inventory
      Returns:
      true. if item is successfully added, false otherwise

    • removeFromInventory

      public boolean removeFromInventory (Tradeable item)
      Remove item from inventory. returns true, if item is successfully removed, false otherwise (item not in the inventory).
      Specified by:
      removeFromInventory in interface Trader
      Parameters:
      item - item to be removed from object's inventory
      Returns:
      true, if item is successfully removed, false otherwise

    • canSteal

      public boolean canSteal()
      Returns true, if this object's HP are not 0 (alive wizard).
      Specified by:
      canSteal in interface Trader
      Returns:
      true, if the object is alive

    • steal

      public boolean steal (Trader thief)
      If thief is null, IllegalArgumentException has to be thrown; if thief cannot steal (canSteal returns false) no action can be taken and false is returned; returns false if, the object's inventory is empty; otherwise transfers a random item from the this object's inventory into the thief's inventory; if the thief's inventory has not enough capacity, the object just vanishes and false is returned; returns true, if theft was successful.
      Specified by:
      steal in interface Trader
      Parameters:
      thief - object that is stealing the item from the this-object.
      Returns:
      true, if theft was successful

    • isLootable

      public boolean isLootable()
      Returns true if, this object's HP are 0 (dead wizard)
      Specified by:
      isLootable in interface Trader
      Returns:
      true if the object is dead

    • canLoot

      public boolean canLoot()
      Returns true if this object's HP are not 0 (alive wizard)
      Specified by:
      canLoot in interface Trader
      Returns:
      true, if the object is alive

    • loot

      public boolean loot (Trader looter)
      Of looter is null, IllegalArgumentException has to be thrown; if looter cannot loot (canLoot returns false), no action can be taken and false is returned; if the this object can be looted (isLootable), transfer all the items in the object's inventory into the looter's inventory; items that don't fit in the looter's inventory because auf the weight limitation just vanish. returns true, if at least one item was successfully transferred, false otherwise.
      Specified by:
      loot in interface Trader
      Parameters:
      looter - object that is looting this-object.
      Returns:
      true, if looting was successful, false otherwise

    • takeDamage

      public void takeDamage (int amount)
      Reduce the object's HP by amount ensuring however that HP does not become negative.
      Specified by:
      takeDamage in interface MagicEffectRealization
      Parameters:
      amount - amount to be deducted from health

    • takeDamagePercent

      public void takeDamagePercent (int percentage)
      Reduce the object's HP by the percentage given of the object's basic HP value ensuring however, that HP does not become negative. Do calculations in double truncating to int only for the assignment
      Specified by:
      takeDamagePercent in interface MagicEffectRealization
      Parameters:
      percentage - percentage of damage done

    • weakenMagic

      public void weakenMagic (int amount)
      Reduce the object's MP by amount ensuring however that MP does not become negative.
      Specified by:
      weakenMagic in interface MagicEffectRealization
      Parameters:
      amount - amount to be deducted from mana

    • weakenMagicPercent

      public void weakenMagicPercent (int percentage)
      Reduce the object's MP by the percentage given of the object's basic MP value ensuring however, that MP does not become negative. Do calculations in double truncating to int only for the assignment
      Specified by:
      weakenMagicPercent in interface MagicEffectRealization
      Parameters:
      percentage - percentage of damage done

      Parameters:

      Specified by:
      healPercent in interface MagicEffectRealization
      Parameters:

      Returns:

      public void setProtection (Set<AttackingSpell> attacks)
      Add all spells from attacks to instance variable protectedFrom
      Specified by:
      setProtection in interface MagicEffectRealization
      Parameters:
      attacks - spells against which protection is provided

    • removeProtection

      public void removeProtection (Set<AttackingSpell> attacks)
      Remove all spells from attacks from instance variable protectedFrom
      Specified by:
      removeProtection in interface MagicEffectRealization
      Parameters:
      attacks - spells against which protection is removed
